feed.title: Stanley Solutions Blog - Conferences
feed.subtitle: engineering and creativity - all under one hat

entry.title: I'm Presenting at LinuxFest Northwest 2024!
entry.summary: This is it... My first non-work-related technical presentation at a conference. It's pretty exciting! It's right in my own back yard, even! I'm presenting at LinuxFest Northwest, 2024!
entry.content:
That's right... this is the big-times! Hah!

I'm very excited to be presenting, this year, at LinuxFest Northwest 2024. This will be the first conference where I present as an individual, and not for work. I'm pretty excited about that. I think it will be a good experience. Unfortunately, I won't have the option to attend in person, since I will simultaneously be helping facilitate for a teen camp-counselor training in Rathdrum, this weekend. Oh, and did I mention I'm also releasing a podcast episode, too?

Yeah... busy weekend.

You can check the full schedule here to get more details about all of the other amazing presentations. Mine will be held at

11:00 AM, Pacific on Saturday

Should be about 30 minutes of presentation, and then I'd love to answer questions about the work. Look forward to seeing you, there (it's free, after all)!

The Presentation!
